awd_titl_txt: SALT:  Specialists and Lead Teachers in Elementary          Mathematics
awd_abstract_narration: SALT will offer courses and workshops for participating                         teachers from each public elementary school in Pickens                          County for a period of 3 years.  These teachers will from a                     core of lead teaches and math specialists so that every                         elementary school has 1 or 2 lead teachers or a math                            specialist.  These teachers will be trained in a hands-                         on/problem solving approach to learning mathematics and will                    be a resource for other teachers in their school.  This                         project is an extension of a two year pilot program which                       puts a math specialist in the Forest Acres Elementary                           School.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)

inst.inst_name: School District of Pickens County S.C.
